Package xxl.core.spatial.points

Implemetns the base type Point for all data that deals with points of arbitrary dimensions and wrappers for double[], float[] and fixed-mantissa points.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Point
    An interface for points.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPoint
    An "implementation" of the Point interface.
    DoublePoint
    A Wrapper for double[]-points that provides useful methods on points like e.g. a conversion mechanism.
    FixedPoint
    A Wrapper for Fixed-Mantissa-Points.
    FloatPoint
    A Wrapper for float[]-points that provides useful methods on points.
    NumberPoint<T extends Number>
    A Wrapper for Number[]-points that provides useful methods on points like e.g. a conversion mechanism.
    Points
    A utility-class that provides useful static methods for Points like distance methods and universe computations.

Package xxl.core.spatial.points Description

Implemetns the base type Point for all data that deals with points of arbitrary dimensions and wrappers for double[], float[] and fixed-mantissa points. Also provides useful static methods for Points like distance methods and universe computations.
